obj = (Select(description='Features', index=1, layout=Layout(height='175px', width='50%'), options=('Age', 'Cabin', 'Embarked'), value='Cabin'), Select(description='Options', layout=Layout(height='300px', width='50%'), options=('Ignore feature', 'Fill null with specfic value', 'Drop feature'), value='Ignore feature'), Text(value='', description='Input:', layout=Layout(bottom='250px', left='48%'), placeholder='Replace Value'), Text(value='', description='Z Score:', layout=Layout(bottom='330px', left='48%'), placeholder='Z-Score Value'), Output())
